description: Number of monoids (semigroups with identity) of order n, considered to be equivalent when they are isomorphic or anti-isomorphic (by reversal of the operator).
references: Andreas Distler and Tom Kelsey, The Monoids of Order Eight and Nine, in Intelligent Computer Mathematics, Lecture Notes in Computer Science, Volume 5144/2008, Springer-Verlag. [From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 10 2009]
links: Eric Postpischil Posting to sci.math newsgroup, May 21 1990
Index entries for sequences related to monoids
A Distler, T Kelsey. The Monoids of Orders Eight, Nine & Ten. preprint. [From _Max Alekseyev_, Jul 13 2009]
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 13 2000
extensions: a(8) and a(9) from the Distler-Kelsey paper [_N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 10 2009]
a(10) from the Distler-Kelsey preprint. _Max Alekseyev_, Jul 13 2009
